sprint_goal: Establish the complete service foundation, including database, CI/CD pipeline, and full observability stack, to enable parallel feature development in subsequent sprints.
Implement core vendor profile and catalog management, enabling vendors to set up their store details, business hours, and add initial products.
Complete the product CRUD lifecycle and establish the foundation for vendor compliance by implementing license management and automated suspension for expired licenses.
Launch the bulk product import feature, including asynchronous CSV processing, detailed error reporting, and automated license expiry reminders for vendors.
Deliver tools for the internal onboarding team to streamline data migration and validation, and provide vendors with a catalog export capability.
